img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 27.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Wukong_Sandgate_27.jpg)
Take the left path to reach the next open area where you’ll face off against both a Rat Soldier and a Rat Governor. Lure the Soldier out of range of the Governor’s lightning attacks to take them on separately, and don’t move yourself out too far, as more enemies and archers are waiting up ahead.
img_below_text:
You should also inspect the raised altar on the wooden platform here, as you can find a turtle-shaped box that holds **Laurel Buds** inside, a new Soak for your Gourd.
![Wukong Sandgate 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ef/Wukong_Sandgate_29.jpg)
summary_promot:

        - Following Text: "You should also inspect the raised altar on the wooden platform here, as you can find a turtle-shaped box that holds **Laurel Buds** inside, a new Soak for your Gourd.
![Wukong Sandgate 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ef/Wukong_Sandgate_29.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong* where the player approaches a wooden platform with a large Buddha statue in the background. A turtle-shaped item, highlighted with a red circle, is placed on a table, indicating it is an interactable object. The on-screen text suggests the player has collected "Shock-Quelling Powder" and has 143 "Will" points. This area appears to be part of an exploration segment where players can find useful items.
